Autonomous AI agents fix security bugs in your smart contracts.
Every fix is cryptographically attested on Base.

View DocumentationStar on GitHub
terminal
$npx kiro-ci init

How It Works

01

Install Hook

Add Kiro-CI to your git workflow. The agent activates on every commit.

02

Agent Fixes Bugs

AI analyzes your Solidity code, detects vulnerabilities, and patches them automatically.

03

Verified on Base

Every successful fix gets an EAS attestation minted on-chain as proof.

See It In Action

Watch how Kiro-CI detects vulnerabilities, applies fixes, and creates on-chain attestations in real-time.

Kiro-CI Security Demo
Vulnerable.sol
1pragma solidity ^0.8.0;
2
3contract Vulnerable {
4 mapping(address => uint) public balances;
5
6 function withdraw() public {
7 (bool s,) = msg.sender.call{value: balances[msg.sender]}("");
8 balances[msg.sender] = 0;
9 }
10}
